i1.name: Call_of_the_Freljord
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} When '''Nunu''' and '''Willump''' deal damage against an enemy {{tip|champion}}, large {{tip|monster}} or {{tip|turrets|structure}}, they and a nearby allied champion gain ''Call of the Freljord'' for 4 seconds, prioritizing the ally with {{sti|{{as|'''highest''' attack speed}}}}.

{{sbc|Call of the Freljord:}} Gain {{sti|{{as|20% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}. '''Willump's''' {{tip|basic attack|basic attacks}} additionally deal {{as|30% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to secondary targets in a cone in front of him.
'''Nunu''' and '''Willump''' cannot trigger ''Call of the Freljord'' from the same enemy again for a time. Successive triggers of ''Call of the Freljord'' will stack the duration.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: When Nunu and Willump deal damage against an enemy champion, large monster or structure, they and a nearby allied champion gain Call of the Freljord for 4 seconds, prioritizing the ally with highest attack speed.
Call of the Freljord: Gain 20% bonus attack speed and 10% bonus movement speed. Willump's basic attacks additionally deal 30% AD physical damage to secondary targets in a cone in front of him.
Nunu and Willump cannot trigger Call of the Freljord from the same enemy again for a time. Successive triggers of Call of the Freljord will stack the duration.
i1.notes:
* The splash damage will critically strike when the basic attack does, but will not deal any bonus damage.
* ''Call of the Freljord'' range to be shared with allies is based on '''Nunu''' and '''Willump's''' location.
** If no ally is prioritized based on their stats, it will be given to the one closest to them.
* Enemies that can trigger ''Call of the Freljord'' have a marker overhead.
** This marker isn't present on inhibitors or the nexus (because they cannot hold buffs and debuffs including the one that hosts this VFX), but they still trigger ''Call of the Freljord'' when attacked.

q1.name: Consume
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Willump''' takes a bite out of the target enemy, dealing damage and {{tip|healing}} himself. The heal is increased by 50% when he is {{as|below 50% '''maximum''' health}}.

Against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}} he deals {{sti|{{as|true damage}}}}. Additionally, if ''Consume'' would kill the target minion or small or medium monster, the target is {{tip|stun|stunned}} and {{tip|airborne|pulled}} towards '''Willump''' over the cast time.
Against {{tip|champions}} he deals {{as|magic damage}} and the heal is reduced to 60%.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Willump takes a bite out of the target enemy, dealing damage and healing himself. The heal is increased by 50% when he is below 50% maximum health.
Against minions and monsters he deals true damage. Additionally, if Consume would kill the target minion or small or medium monster, the target is stunned and pulled towards Willump over the cast time.
Against champions he deals magic damage and the heal is reduced to 60%.
leveling:
{{st|Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|340 to 980}}}}
{{st|Base Healing from Non-Champions|{{ap|65 to 185}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' health)}}|Empowered Healing from Non-Champions|{{ap|65*1.5 to 185*1.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|90*1.5}}% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10*1.5}}% '''bonus''' health)}}}}

{{st|Champion Damage|{{ap|60 to 220}} {{as|(+ 65% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% '''bonus''' health)}}}}
{{st|Base Healing from Champions|{{ap|65*0.6 to 185*0.6}} {{as|(+ {{ap|90*0.6}}% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10*0.6}}% '''bonus''' health)}}|Empowered Healing from Champions|{{ap|65*0.6*1.5 to 185*0.8*1.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|90*0.6*1.5}}% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10*0.6*1.5}}% '''bonus''' health)}}}}
q1.notes:
* Icon border glows when he is within the maximum healing threshold.
** This counts as an immobilization for triggering [[Immolate]].
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block the damage and the heal.
{{Unit-targeted cancel conditions}}

effects.str:
• Non-Champion Damage:
  • Base Healing from Non-Champions: (+ 90% AP) (+ 10% bonus health)
  • Empowered Healing from Non-Champions: (+ % AP) (+ % bonus health)

• Champion Damage: (+ 65% AP) (+ 5% bonus health)
  • Base Healing from Champions: (+ % AP) (+ % bonus health)
  • Empowered Healing from Champions: (+ % AP) (+ % bonus health)

w1.name: Biggest_Snowball_Ever!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Willump''' {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} himself from all {{tip|slow|slows}} and {{tip|channel|channels}} for up to 10 seconds, becoming {{tip|ghosted}}, {{tip|slow-immune}} and creating a rolling {{ccib|Biggest Snowball Ever! Minimap.png||snowball}}. '''Willump''' automatically navigates his movement and can steer the snowball with a {{tt|slow turn rate|See notes.}} that increases over time, resetting upon changing direction. The duo have their {{sti|{{as|movement speed}}}} reduced by {{as|50%|ms}} for the first 1 second, but after a delay they start gaining {{tt|{{as|14 movement speed}}|Estimated}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds, {{tt|up to a cap|See notes.}}.

The snowball increases in size and power over 5 seconds. ''Biggest Snowball Ever!'' can be recast after {{fd|0.5}} seconds during the channel, and does so automatically after the channel or if {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}.

The snowball explodes upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}}, {{tip|pet|large pet}}, medium / large {{tip|monster}} or terrain, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies, increased by {{pp|type=charge time|key=%|0;0 to 400 for 5|0 to 5|formula=increases per frame after 1 second}}, {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{pp|type=charge time|0.5;0.5 to 0.75 for 5|0 to 5|formula=Increases per game tick after 1 second.}} seconds and subsequently {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{pp|type=charge time|0;0;0;0 to 0.5 for 9|0;1;2 to 5|formula=Increases per game tick after 2.33 seconds.}} seconds.
The snowball rolls over enemy {{tip|minion|minions}} and small monsters hit, dealing {{fd|33.3}}% of the damage as {{as|magic damage}}.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Willump''' releases the snowball, sending it rolling forward up to a maximum distance during which it will not grow any larger and will explode upon hitting an enemy.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Willump cleanses himself from all slows and channels for up to 10 seconds, becoming ghosted, slow-immune and creating a rolling Unknown value: ccib / Biggest Snowball Ever! Minimap.png / / snowball. Willump automatically navigates his movement and can steer the snowball with a slow turn rate that increases over time, resetting upon changing direction. The duo have their movement speed reduced by 50% for the first 1 second, but after a delay they start gaining 14 movement speed every 0.25 seconds, up to a cap.
The snowball increases in size and power over 5 seconds. Biggest Snowball Ever! can be recast after 0.5 seconds during the channel, and does so automatically after the channel or if interrupted.
The snowball explodes upon hitting an enemy champion, large pet, medium / large monster or terrain, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies, increased by 0 to 5 ‒ undefined, knocking them up for 0 to 5 ‒ undefined seconds and subsequently stunning them for 0;1;2 to 5 ‒ undefined seconds.
The snowball rolls over enemy minions and small monsters hit, dealing 33.3% of the damage as magic damage.
Recast: Willump releases the snowball, sending it rolling forward up to a maximum distance during which it will not grow any larger and will explode upon hitting an enemy.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Explosion Damage|{{ap|36 to 72}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Explosion Damage|{{ap|36*5 to 72*5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|30*5}}% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
*The initial cast and the manual recast count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The movement speed reduction the duo receive from initially casting ''Biggest Snowball Ever!'' is not considered a {{tip|slow}}, thus it will not be resisted by their {{tip|slow-immune|slow immunity}}.
* There are 3 stages where the turn rate increases from the original one:
** After turning for 1 second, the turn rate is increased to 175%.
** After turning for 3 seconds, the turn rate is increased to 250%.
** After turning for 6 seconds, the turn rate is increased to 325% where it caps.
* The time threshold to begin gaining bonus movement speed may be bugged, as Flat Bonus MS increases the time while % Bonus MS decreases the time.
** The formula appears to be (X ÷ 100) - Y, where:
*** X = '''Total''' Flat MS after caps
*** Y = {{fd|0.1}} per 1% %MS 
** The delay is not modified from its initially calculated value on-cast, even if additional movement speed is gained.
* '''Nunu and Willump''' keep all increases in {{as|movement speed}} at time of cast for the duration of the charge.
* '''Nunu and Willump's''' movement speed always increases in increments of ~14, reaching the greater value between {{ft|{{as|'''Total''' MS + {{pp|85 to 255}}|movement speed}}|{{as|'''Total'''|ms}} [[Movement_speed#Movement_speed_caps|Uncapped]] {{as|Flat MS + {{pp|85 to 255}}|movement speed}}}} (''click to toggle'').
** This takes 6 increments to reach the '''Total''' MS + 85, but may take more to reach the Uncapped Flat + 85. Due to flat bonuses increasing the time threshold, it is possible for the ability's effects to end before reaching the '''total''' uncapped movement speed.
** The '''bonus''' movement speed ignores the [[Movement_speed#Movement_speed_caps|movement speed cap]].
* If '''Nunu''' turns continuously he will create a {{tt|600|Estimated}} unit circle, increased with '''bonus''' movement speed, striking the same point up to 3 times, for a maximum of {{as|{{ap|180|225|270|315|360}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 300% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}}. The damage can be further increased by detonating the snowball, for a '''total''' of {{as|{{ap|360|450|540|630|720}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+450% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}}.
* {{cai|Realm Warp|Ryze}} will only teleport '''Nunu and Willump''', leaving the {{ccib|Biggest Snowball Ever! Minimap.png||snowball}} behind.
* Hovering the cursor on the HUD (e.g [[Map (League of Legends)|mini map]] / champion portraits) does not affect the cast and steering of ''Biggest Snowball Ever!''.
* '''Nunu''' gains a slightly larger field of view during ''Biggest Snowball Ever!''.
* ''Biggest Snowball Ever!'' is disabled for the first 15 seconds of the game.
* {{tip|Displacement immunity}} will not resist the application of the {{tip|stun}}.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Nunu & Willump''' are {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|move=Allowed, but cannot input movement commands.|cast=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=false|interrupts=death, ground, root, silence}}

effects.str:
• Minimum Explosion Damage: (+ 30% AP)
  • Maximum Explosion Damage: (+ % AP)

• Minimum Rollover Damage: (+ % AP)
  • Maximum Rollover Damage: (+ % AP)

e1.name: Snowball_Barrage
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nunu''' swiftly throws a volley of 3 snowballs in the target direction over {{fd|0.4}} seconds that each shatter upon hitting an enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies in a cone.

Enemies hit 3 times are {{tip|slow|slowed}} for 1 second. {{tip|Champions}} and large {{tip|monsters}} hit once are marked ''Snowbound'' for 4 seconds, refreshing on each hit. ''Snowball Barrage'' can be recast twice within 3 seconds at no additional cost and with a cooldown in between casts.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Nunu''' hurls another volley of snowballs, mimicking the first cast's effects. An enemy may only be {{tip|slow|slowed}} once for being hit by snowballs.
After 3 seconds from the first cast, ''Snowbound'' enemies near '''Willump''' take {{as|magic damage}} and are {{tip|root|rooted}} for {{pp|0.5 to 1.5}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nunu swiftly throws a volley of 3 snowballs in the target direction over 0.4 seconds that each shatter upon hitting an enemy, dealing magic damage to enemies in a cone.
Enemies hit 3 times are slowed for 1 second. Champions and large monsters hit once are marked Snowbound for 4 seconds, refreshing on each hit. Snowball Barrage can be recast twice within 3 seconds at no additional cost and with a cooldown in between casts.
Recast: Nunu hurls another volley of snowballs, mimicking the first cast's effects. An enemy may only be slowed once for being hit by snowballs.
After 3 seconds from the first cast, Snowbound enemies near Willump take magic damage and are rooted for 0.5 − 1.5 (based on level) seconds.
leveling: {{st|Damage Per Snowball|{{ap|16 to 48}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Damage Per Volley|{{ap|16*3 to 48*3}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|16*3*3 to 48*3*3}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
e1.notes:
* Each cast volley of snowballs counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}
** Each volley of snowballs is also a separate {{tip|cast instance}}, allowing ''Snowball Barrage'' to trigger {{ri|Phase Rush}} on its own or trigger 6 stacks of {{ri|Conqueror}}.
** ''Snowbound'' consumption does not trigger on-cast effects, neither does it count as a separate {{tip|cast instance}} (e.g. for the purposes of {{ri|Conqueror}}).
* The three snowballs are thrown independently from one another over the {{fd|0.4}} seconds and their direction is determined from '''Nunu & Willump's''' position at any given moment.

effects.str:
• Damage Per Snowball: (+ 10% AP)
  • Damage Per Volley: (+ 30% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 90% AP)

r1.name: Absolute_Zero
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nunu''' and '''Willump''' {{tip|channel}} a blizzard for up to 3 seconds, gaining a {{tip|shield}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} nearby enemies by {{pp|type=channel time|key=%|0;50 to 95 for 11;95|0 to 3|formula=Increases by 4.5% every 0.25 seconds. ''Starts at 0.25 seconds and finishes at 2.75 seconds''}}.
''Absolute Zero'' can be recast after {{fd|0.5}} seconds during the channel, and does so automatically when the channel ends by any means.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Nunu''' and '''Willump''' explode, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies, modified to {{pp|key=%|type=channel time|changedisplay=true|0 to 100|0 to 3 by 1|formula=Increases the damage by 1% of its damage value every 0.03 seconds.}}. Affected enemies will remain {{tip|slow|slowed}} for {{pp|type=channel time|0 to 3 for 13|0 to 3}} seconds and any of the duo's remaining shield will decay over 3 seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nunu and Willump channel a blizzard for up to 3 seconds, gaining a shield and slowing nearby enemies by 0 to 3 ‒ undefined.
Absolute Zero can be recast after 0.5 seconds during the channel, and does so automatically when the channel ends by any means.
Recast: Nunu and Willump explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies, modified to 0 to 3 by 1 ‒ undefined. Affected enemies will remain slowed for 0 to 3 ‒ undefined seconds and any of the duo's remaining shield will decay over 3 seconds.
r1.notes:
*The initial cast and the manual recast count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The affected area is hidden if the duo is not {{tip|sight|visible}} to the enemy team.
* While it's unlikely to happen normally, it is possible to deal zero damage with ''Absolute Zero'' if canceled as soon as it's started.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Nunu & Willump''' are {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|cast=interrupts|items=interrupts,true,,false|spells=true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts}}

effects.str: • Shield: (+ 150% AP) (+ % bonus health)
